summary: Implements a pipeline that performs textâ€‘guided image inpainting using Stable Diffusion combined with the DiffEdit technique. It encodes images into latent space, optionally inverts them, generates masks from textual prompts, runs a conditional UNet denoiser with forward and inverse schedulers, decodes the edited latents back to pixel space, and applies a safety filter. The pipeline also supports loading textual inversion embeddings and LoRA weight files.
business_intent: Provide developers and creators with an automated tool to modify or fill image regions based on natural language instructions, streamlining creative editing, rapid prototyping, and safe content generation.
